markdownContent: Alright. Apparently you've just applied---you've *been* applied---for an internship and been accepted? On the one hand: great timing, this could really be an opportunity to get some ideas. On the other, being pressured into doing this feels a little uncomfortable. I mean, sure, it's Shorter---sorry, “Alex”---and (as you stretch out again on your sunbed) you can't claim to have much else planned for the summer. But still. After searching online for the museum, you find out that the director is a certain Laura Brobdingnagian. Conveniently, the museum has a collection of medical tools, which sounds interesting...
